column1: Figure 5: For responding businesses that are continuing to trade, an average of 60% felt confident they had the financial resources available to continue operating throughout COVID-19

column2:
1. Final results, Wave 2 of the Office for National Statistics’ (ONS’) Business Impact of Coronavirus (COVID-19) Survey (BICS) that are continuing to trade (n = 4,650).
2. Real estate services, other services, and the mining and quarrying sector have been removed because of their low response rates, but their totals are included in “all industries”.
